Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 77th overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Charles Bodkin (COL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/2015, off Gary Zoll (CIN)...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/2015, hitting .480 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/2016, hitting .407 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
10/3/2016: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis (C), $15,585,000 per year, for 3 years.
Won Gold Glove at Second Base in 2017...
Injured on 4/14/2018 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 5-6 weeks...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to San Francisco on 7/15/2018 (Going to STL: 2B Michael Holgate, LF Micheal Dore, RF Donald Lamberth, P Brian Eppinger. Going to SF: 2B Maurice Sydnor, P Barry Sechrist, P
Lino Gonzalez, P Alfonso Rodriguez)...
Injured on 5/12/2019 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for full season...
9/26/2019: Signed a contract extension with San Francisco, $11,000,000 per year, for 1 years.
Injured on 7/12/2020 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 9/2/2020 with a Fractured Cheekbone, out for 6 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 2/2/2021 to a 2-year deal worth $1,755,000 per year...
